Source code for comet.utilities.utility

import collections
import inspect
import os
from typing import Text

DS = "DS"
SF = "SF"
DST = "DST"
POLICY = "policy"
DM = "DM"
US = "US"
NLU = "NLU"
NLG = "NLG"
DF = "DF"
dst_mapping = {
    "DummyDialogueStateTracker": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialog_state_tracker.dummy_dst",
        "class": "DummyDialogueStateTracker"
    },
    "HardDialogueStateTracker": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialog_state_tracker.hard_dst",
        "class": "HardDialogueStateTracker"
    },
    "BabeDialogueStateTracker": {
        "package": "applications.babe_sale_bot.babe_dst",
        "class": "BabeDialogueStateTracker"
    }

}

ds_mapping = {
    "DialogueState": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.state",
        "class": "DialogueState"
    }
}
sf_mapping = {
    "StateFeaturizer": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialogue_featurizers.state_featurizer",
        "class": "StateFeaturizer"
    }
}
policy_mapping = {
    "SVMPolicy": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialogue_policy.supervised_learning.svm_classifier_policy",
        "class": "SVMPolicy"
    },
    "VanillaPolicy": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialogue_policy.supervised_learning.vanilla_classifier_policy",
        "class": "VanillaPolicy"
    },
    "DummyPolicy": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialogue_policy.rule_based_learning.dummy_policy",
        "class": "DummyPolicy"
    },
    "HandcraftedPolicy": {
        "package": "applications.babe_sale_bot.babe_handcraft_policy.py",
        "class": "HardDialogueStateTracker"
    },
}

nlg_mapping = {
    "DummyNLG": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.nlg.dummy_nlg",
        "class": "DummyNLG"
    },
    "SlotFillingNLG": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.nlg.slotfilling_nlg",
        "class": "SlotFillingNLG"
    }

}

nlu_mapping = {
    "DummyNLU": {
        "package": "comet.agent.nlu.dummy_nlu",
        "class": "DummyNLU"
    },
    "SlotFillingNLU": {
        "package": "comet.agent.nlu.slot_filling_nlu",
        "class": "SlotFillingNLU"
    }

}

dm_mapping = {
    "DialogueManager": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialogue_manager.dialogue_manager",
        "class": "DialogueManager"
    }
}

df_mapping = {
    "StateFeaturizer": {
        "package": "comet.agent.core.dialogue_featurizers.state_featurizer",
        "class": "StateFeaturizer"
    }
}



[docs]def retrieve_component_from_class_name(type_com, class_name):
    if type_com == DS:
        module = ds_mapping.get(class_name)
    elif type_com == DST:
        module = dst_mapping.get(class_name)
    elif type_com == DM:
        module = dm_mapping.get(class_name)
    elif type_com.startswith(POLICY):
        module = policy_mapping.get(class_name)
    elif type_com == DF:
        module = df_mapping.get(class_name)
    elif type_com == NLG:
        module = nlg_mapping.get(class_name)
    elif type_com == NLU:
        module = nlu_mapping.get(class_name)
    else:
        raise ValueError(f"Only support component type from 0->7 not {type_com}")
    if module is None:
        raise ModuleNotFoundError(f"Cannot found package with class: {class_name}")

    return module




[docs]def auto_fill_package_module(type_com, config_module):
    """
    Auto filled package, class, arguments from config_module

    Args:
        type_com: type of components
        config_module: a dictionary containing: package, class, arguments

    Returns:

    """
    if "package" not in config_module:
        module_filled = retrieve_component_from_class_name(type_com, config_module['class'])
        config_module.update(module_filled)
    return config_module




[docs]def update(d):
    for k, v in d.iteritems():
        if isinstance(v, collections.Mapping):
            d[k] = update(d.get(k, {}), v)
        else:
            d[k] = v
    return d




[docs]def get_cfd(backward=0):
    """
    Get current file directory
    :param backward:
    :type backward:
    :return:
    :rtype:
    """

    stack = inspect.stack()
    abspath = stack[1][1]
    abspath = os.path.dirname(abspath)
    for i in range(backward):
        abspath = os.path.dirname(abspath)
    abspath = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), abspath)
    return abspath



PRJ_DIR = os.getcwd()
SYSTEM_DIR = get_cfd(1)
